long: Meaning: to "reside" or "permanently stay" (literally or figuratively).  Usage: abide, continue, (cause to, make to) dwell(-er), have habitation, inhabit, lay, place, (cause to) remain, rest, set (up).  Source: a primitive root (apparently akin (by transmission) to "H7901" through the idea of lodging; compare "H5531", "H7925");
